member.name: M:HealthGateway.WebClient.Controllers.UserFeedbackController.CreateUserProfile(HealthGateway.Database.Models.UserFeedback)
member.summary: Posts a user feedback json to be inserted into the database.
member.response: The user feedback record was saved.
The user feedback was already inserted.
The client must authenticate itself to get the requested response.
The client does not have access rights to the content; that is, it is unauthorized, so the server is refusing to give the requested resource. Unlike 401, the client's identity is known to the server.
